LanguageData.DeepDrilling.label: 深鑽機
LanguageData.DeepDrilling.description: 建造深鑽機，可從地下深處開採礦物。你需要地質掃描器才能找出礦物位置。

DeepDrilling.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->moved in with a dirtmole-led corp, studying its deepest excavations
subject_story->drilled down to the ice cap's root to discover the world's extinct prehuman biome
subject_story->became wealthy from the resources dug out of the world's core

LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.label: 液晶電視
LanguageData.FlatscreenTelevision.description: 製作高解析度的液晶電視，提供更棒的娛樂。

FlatscreenTelevision.generalRules.rulesS.li: subject_story->experimented with removing tubes from televisions
subject_story->agitated for galaxy-wide, high-resolution broadcasts of [tv_content]
subject_story->became a television executive, in charge of [tv_content]

LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.label: 地質掃描器
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.description: 建造地質掃描器，可以掃描出地底下的礦物資源。建造需要高級零件。

GroundPenetratingScanner.generalRules.ru.li: subject_story->discovered the bones of ancient giants, far below the planet's surface
subject_story->stumbled across a rich gold seam whilst scanning for tin and became fabulously wealthy
subject_story->scanned the ground for ancient minefields, to protect the people

LanguageData.HeavyTurrets.label: 機關砲塔

HeavyTurrets.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->held off a cultist assault alone, hiding behind a wall of turrets
subject_story->was hired to establish a defensive perimeter of sandbags and turrets for the locals
subject_story->built turret after turret, never asking who was buying them

LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: 醫療床
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: 建造可以提昇醫療效果的醫療床。

HospitalBed.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->oversaw a revolution in the standards of medical care
subject_story->constructed the first of the system's public hospitals
subject_story->focused on profit, selling their superior medical suites to the wealthy

LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.label: 長程礦物掃描器
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.description: 長程礦物掃描器能夠探測出區域以外的珍貴礦物。可調整找到特定礦物。建造需要高級零件。

LongRangeMineralScanner.generalRules.rul.li: subject_story->built so many scanners that the planet's entire geology was revealed
subject_story->discovered with a scanner what the other settlements were mining and made huge profits through trading
subject_story->mined out the entirety of the planet's jade for religious effigies

LanguageData.MedicineProduction.label: 醫療包
LanguageData.MedicineProduction.description: 將藥草、中性胺、棉布製作成產業技術的醫療包。

MedicineProduction.generalRules.rulesStr.li: subject_story->researched urbworld medicine, aiming to distribute the knowledge more widely
subject_story->was puzzled by the origins of neutroamine and determined to find out more
subject_story->seized the resources of a drug-dealer and produced useful medicines instead

LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.label: 微電子學
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.description: 更複雜的微電子學。解鎖高科技研究桌、通訊台。

MicroelectronicsBasics.generalRules.rule.li: subject_story->moved into the development of microelectronics
subject_story->constructed the first of many research bench variants
subject_story->moved from town to town, praising the virtues of pure research

LanguageData.MoisturePump.label: 排水泵
LanguageData.MoisturePump.description: 建造排水泵，可緩慢逐步地將使周圍地面的水分正常化。將泥地變成土地，軟沙地變成沙地。

MoisturePump.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->studied the ancient windmill moisture pumps of Earth
subject_story->drained the great swamps that bred disease
subject_story->tried to drain the seas, foolishly

LanguageData.MultibarrelWeapons.label: 多管武器

MultibarrelWeapons.generalRules.rulesStr.li: subject_story->constructed a unique portable minigun, which was the only thing found after the squad's disappearance
subject_story->designed massive hoppers to ensure the minigun ammo didn't run out
subject_story->built guns explicitly to kill every last person in a room

LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.label: 精密膛線
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.description: 製作精密的槍械，如突擊步槍、狙擊步槍。

PrecisionRifling.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->improved the tolerances of a foundry's processes, enabling the production of quality rifling
subject_story->was hunted by neanderthals but constructed a sniper rifle to safely kill their leader
subject_story->became briefly famous for shooting an ambrosia fruit out of the overlord's hand

LanguageData.ShieldBelt.label: 護盾
LanguageData.ShieldBelt.description: 製作可穿戴式護盾，使用動能排斥力場技術來阻擋槍彈穿越力場邊界。

ShieldBelt.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->survived an assassination attempt, thanks to a prototype shield
subject_story->hustled at billiards, using a hidden momentum repeller
subject_story->killed an enemy by advancing a blade slowly enough to bypass their shield

LanguageData.TransportPod.label: 運輸艙
LanguageData.TransportPod.description: 建造運輸艙，可用來運送人們、長距離的物資運輸。也可用來襲擊、旅行、贈送禮物等等。

TransportPod.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->landed a pod in the middle of a feral tribe and barely escaped alive
subject_story->spent a fortune sending a transport pod to the object of their affection, carrying a single wedding ring
subject_story->staved off famine through judicious pod deployment
